about_the_game:
The long-awaited game adaptation of ONIBITO KIKI is finally here!

Relive the excitement of 90s-style retro 2D graphics in a side-scrolling action game that has come back to life. ONIBITO, an ancient clan of warriors, battles to protect the world in this fantasy action adventure, now available as a game!

The story’s protagonist, KIKI, is the current head of the ONIBITO clan. She takes on requests to face numerous crises, defeating powerful enemies along the way. Experience the thrill of overwhelming your foes with her unique combat style and special abilities!

A blend of nostalgia and novelty in side-scrolling battles!

With pixel art and sounds reminiscent of the 90s, combined with modern game systems, these battles are enjoyable for both retro gamers and newcomers alike. Use unique special abilities to conquer enemies and tackle one challenging scenario after another.

Story Overview

One day, a request arrives from a foreign land for KIKI. She embarks alone to confront a lurking conspiracy. Known only to a few as the legendary ONIBITO leader, will KIKI’s power be enough to bring peace to the world once more?

Features

  • The highly anticipated first-ever game adaptation of ONIBITO KIKI!

  • Side-scrolling action with faithful recreation of 90s 2D graphics.

  • Strategic battles utilizing special abilities.

  • A retro-inspired world combining nostalgic and fresh design elements.

With Kiki’s awakening in this long-awaited game adaptation, join her on an epic journey through the world of battle!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 (4th generation or newer) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
